MASTER_PAD_VERSION_INFO.MASTER_PAD_INFO: Portable Application Description, or PAD for short, is a data set that is used by shareware authors to dissemminate information to anyone interested in their software products. To find out more go to http://www.asp-shareware.org/pad

Program_Info.Program_OS_Support: Mac OS X,Mac OS X 10.4,Mac OS X 10.5,Mac OS X 10.6
Program_Info.Program_Change_Info: This is a bugfix release to make AdiumBook 1.5 work on the new Snow Leopard

English.Keywords: Adium, addressbook, Address Book, free, freeware, applescript, bridge, simple, intuitive, search, find, manage, update, sync, synchronize, synchronization, icon, picture, photo, avatar, IM, instant message, msn, jabber, gtalk, icq, aim, yahoo,contact
English.Char_Desc_45: AdiumBook syncs Adium & Address Book contacts
English.Char_Desc_80: Free bridge app between Adium and Address Book to keep your contacts in sync.
English.Char_Desc_250: A free Mac OS X bridge application between Adium and Address Book to keep your contacts in sync. Add contacts, update people's info using Adium data, full text search for both applications, useful reports listing missing or incomplete contacts.
English.Char_Desc_450: A free Mac OS X bridge application between Adium and Address Book, used to search, manage and keep your contacts in sync. Add Adium contacts to Address Book, update card's information using Adium data, full text search for both applications. Useful reports listing of contacts grouped by IM service, contacts with/without picture, contacts present in Adium but not in Address Book and vice versa.
English.Char_Desc_2000:
A free Mac OS X bridge application between Adium and Address Book, used to search, manage and keep your contacts in sync.
Manage: Add Adium contacts to Address Book, update card's information using Adium data.
Search: Find an Adium contact in Address Book and vice versa, full text search for both applications.
Reports: Listing of contacts grouped by IM service, contacts with/without picture, contacts present in Adium but not in Address Book and vice versa.
Extra: Simple intuitive interface, download and run, no configuration required. Open Source software, with full AppleScript Studio project sources available.
